an5.23:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, jatarupassa upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittham jatarupam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca na ca samma upeti kammaya.
an5.23:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, panca jatarupassa upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittham jatarupam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca na ca samma upeti kammaya.
an5.23:1.5: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, jatarupam imehi pancahi upakkilesehi vimuttam hoti, tam hoti jatarupam mudu ca kammaniyanca pabhassaranca na ca pabhangu samma upeti kammaya.
an5.23:1.6: Yassa yassa ca pilandhanavikatiya akankhati—yadi muddikaya yadi kundalaya yadi giveyyakaya yadi suvannamalaya—tancassa attham anubhoti.
an5.23:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancime cittassa upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittham cittam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca na ca samma samadhiyati asavanam khayaya.
an5.23:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, panca cittassa upakkilesa yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittham cittam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca na ca samma samadhiyati asavanam khayaya.
an5.23:2.5: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, cittam imehi pancahi upakkilesehi vimuttam hoti, tam hoti cittam mudu ca kammaniyanca pabhassaranca na ca pabhangu samma samadhiyati asavanam khayaya.
an5.23:2.6: Yassa yassa ca abhinnasacchikaraniyassa dhammassa cittam abhininnameti abhinnasacchikiriyaya tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an5.23:3.1: So sace akankhati: ‘anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhaveyyam—ekopi hutva bahudha assam, bahudhapi hutva eko assam; avibhavam, tirobhavam; tirokuttam tiropakaram tiropabbatam asajjamano gaccheyyam, seyyathapi akase; pathaviyapi ummujjanimujjam kareyyam, seyyathapi udake; udakepi abhijjamano gaccheyyam, seyyathapi pathaviyam; akasepi pallankena kameyyam, seyyathapi pakkhi sakuno; imepi candimasuriye evammahiddhike evammahanubhave panina parimaseyyam parimajjeyyam yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteyyan’ti,
an5.23:3.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an5.23:4.1: So sace akankhati: ‘dibbaya sotadhatuya visuddhaya atikkantamanusikaya ubho sadde suneyyam—dibbe ca manuse ca ye dure santike ca’ti,
an5.23:4.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an5.23:5.1: So sace akankhati: ‘parasattanam parapuggalanam cetasa ceto paricca pajaneyyam—
an5.23:5.2: saragam va cittam saragam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.3: vitaragam va cittam vitaragam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.4: sadosam va cittam sadosam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.5: vitadosam va cittam vitadosam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.6: samoham va cittam samoham cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.7: vitamoham va cittam vitamoham cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.8: sankhittam va cittam sankhittam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.9: vikkhittam va cittam vikkhittam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.10: mahaggatam va cittam mahaggatam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.11: amahaggatam va cittam amahaggatam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.12: sauttaram va cittam sauttaram cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.13: anuttaram va cittam anuttaram cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.14: samahitam va cittam samahitam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.15: asamahitam va cittam asamahitam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.16: vimuttam va cittam vimuttam cittanti pajaneyyam,
an5.23:5.17: avimuttam va cittam avimuttam cittanti pajaneyyan’ti,
an5.23:5.18: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an5.23:6.1: So sace akankhati: ‘anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussareyyam, seyyathidam—ekampi jatim dvepi jatiyo tissopi jatiyo catassopi jatiyo pancapi jatiyo dasapi jatiyo visampi jatiyo timsampi jatiyo cattarisampi jatiyo pannasampi jatiyo jatisatampi jatisahassampi jatisatasahassampi anekepi samvattakappe anekepi vivattakappe anekepi samvattavivattakappe—amutrasim evamnamo evangotto evamvanno evamaharo evamsukhadukkhappatisamvedi evamayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapadim; tatrapasim evamnamo evangotto evamvanno evamaharo evamsukhadukkhappatisamvedi evamayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhupapannoti, iti sakaram sauddesam anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussareyyan’ti,
an5.23:6.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an5.23:7.1: So sace akankhati: ‘dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passeyyam cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne, sugate duggate yathakammupage satte pajaneyyam—ime vata bhonto satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana, te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna; ime va pana bhonto satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana, te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapannati, iti dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passeyyam cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne, sugate duggate yathakammupage satte pajaneyyan’ti,
an5.23:7.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane.
an5.23:8.1: So sace akankhati: ‘asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
an5.23:8.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunati sati sati ayatane”ti.
